text:
Modern-Day Implications

The legacy of MKUltra continues to influence contemporary debates on

government secrecy, surveillance, and the ethics of psychological

experimentation. The project's history serves as a cautionary tale about the

dangers of unchecked power and the importance of transparency in scientific

research (6).

References:

[1] Central Intelligence Agency. (1953). Project MKUltra, The CIA Document.

Retrieved from https://www.cia.gov/library/readingroom/document/cia-

rdp80-010438r000100150001-4
